Package semsim.owl

Class SemSimOWLFactory

java.lang.Object
semsim.owl.SemSimOWLFactory
public class SemSimOWLFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Class mostly providing convenience methods for working with OWL API objects
Author:
mneal

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  SemSimOWLFactory.RestrictionVisitor
    Code from OWL API example on GitHub Visits existential restrictions and collects the properties which are restricted.

    • addExternalReferenceClass

      public static void addExternalReferenceClass​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology destinationont, java.lang.String clsIRI, java.lang.String physicaltype, java.lang.String humreadname, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyManager manager)
      Add an external reference class to a SemSim model ontology
      Parameters:
      destinationont - The SemSim model ontology to which the class will be added
      clsIRI - The IRI of the class as a string
      physicaltype - The physical type of the reference class (e.g. physical entity, process, etc.)
      humreadname - A human-readable free text definition for the class
      manager - An OWLOntologyManager instance

      Parameters:

      classIRI - The IRI of the class as a String
      parentnames - IRIs (as Strings) of the parent classes in the ontology that should subsume the input class

      Parameters:
      ont - The SemSim model ontology to which the individuals will be added
      indIRIs - The IRIs of the individuals as Strings
      parentIRI - The IRI of the parent class that will subsume the individuals (as a String)
      suffix - An option suffix to append to each individual's IRI

    • createSemSimIndividuals

      public static void createSemSimIndividuals​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String[]> indandparents, java.lang.String suffix, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyManager manager) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException
      Create individuals under different parent classes
      Parameters:
      ont - The SemSim model ontology to which the individuals will be added
      indandparents - A Hashtable containing a the list of the individuals' IRIs (as Strings) and the IRIs of the parent classes that should subsume them (also as Strings).
      suffix - An optional suffix to append to each individual's IRI
      manager - An OWLOntologyManager instance
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException

    • subclassIndividual

    • addExistentialObjectPropertyRestrictionOnIndividual

      public static void addExistentialObjectPropertyRestrictionOnIndividual​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, java.lang.String ind, java.lang.String property, java.lang.String value, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyManager manager)
      Add an object property restriction to use as a superclass on an individual (uses the "some" restriction type). E.g. individual x -contains- some reference ontology class
      Parameters:
      ont - Ontology that will contain the restriction
      ind - The IRI of the individual that the restriction is on (as a String)
      property - The IRI of the object property used in the restriction (as a String)
      value - The IRI of the class used in the object property restriction
      manager - An OWLOntologyManager

    • setIndObjectProperty

      public static void setIndObjectProperty​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String object, Relation rel, Relation invrel, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyManager manager) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException
      Assert an object property axiom on an individual E.g. individual x -partOf- individual y
      Parameters:
      ont - The ontology that will contain the axiom
      subject - The IRI of the subject individual (as in subject-predicate-object statements)
      object - The IRI of the object individual
      rel - The object property used in the axiom (as a Relation)
      invrel - The inverse of the object property used in the axiom (to assert inverse axiom as well)
      manager - An OWLOntologyManager
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException

    • setIndObjectPropertyWithAnnotations

      public static void setIndObjectPropertyWithAnnotations​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String object, Relation rel, Relation invrel, java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAnnotation> annsforrel, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyManager manager) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException
      Add an object property axiom to an individual along with annotations on the axiom
      Parameters:
      ont - The ontology that will contain the axiom
      subject - IRI of the subject individual
      object - IRI of the object individual
      rel - The object property used in the axiom (as a Relation
      invrel - The inverse of the object property used in the axiom, to assert inverse axiom if desired
      annsforrel - A set of OWLAnnotations to add to the axiom
      manager - An OWLOntologyManager
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException

      indIRI - IRI of the individual

    • getFunctionalIndDatatypePropertyValues

      public static java.lang.String getFunctionalIndDatatypePropertyValues​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, java.lang.String indIRI, java.lang.String propIRI) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException
      Retrieve a functional datatype property value for one individual
      Parameters:
      ont - The ontology containing the individual
      indIRI - IRI of the individual
      propIRI - The IRI of the datatype property
      Returns:
      The value for the datatype axiom on the individual, if present. If there are multiple datatype axioms on the individual that use the property, the value for the first axiom is returned.
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException

      Parameters:
      ontology - The ontology containing the individual
      annind - The individual to annotate
      value - The RDF:label value
      manager - An OWLOntologyManager

    • getAllSubclasses

      public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllSubclasses​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, java.lang.String parentIRI, java.lang.Boolean includeparent) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLException

    • getRDFcomment

      public static java.lang.String getRDFcomment​(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ont, org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLEntity ent)
      Retrieve the RDF:comment on an OWLEntity. Returns an empty String if there are no RDF:comments or if multiple RDF:comments exist.
      Parameters:
      ont - The ontology containing the OWLEntity
      ent - The OWLEntity
      Returns:
      The RDF:comment on an OWLEntity, if there is exactly one. If zero or more than one, returns an empty String.

    • generateUniqueIRIwithNumber

      public static java.lang.String generateUniqueIRIwithNumber​(java.lang.String iritoappend, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> existingmembers)
      If a given IRI matches an IRI in an input set of IRIs, make it unique by appending it with an integer
      Parameters:
      iritoappend - The IRI to append with an integer until it is different from the IRIs in the input set
      existingmembers - The set of other IRIs
      Returns:
      An IRI that does not match any of the IRIs in the input set
